summary: The Basques are an ethnic group from Southwestern Europe, known for their unique language and culture. They are native to a region called the Basque Country, which spans parts of Spain and France near the Pyrenees mountains and the Bay of Biscay. The Basques have a long history, tracing their ancestry to ancient tribes like the Vascones and Aquitanians. Their language, Basque, sets them apart and is an essential part of their cultural identity.
title: Basques
